fields.description:
When I run my apps in appcelerator studio am getting below error

Step 1 : Even I logout using `appc logout -D` and I re-login again then I run my apps also am getting same issue

Note: Multiple times I did Step 1 (repeatedly)

Can any help me out, How to resolve it

Error:

[ERROR] :  {color:#d04437}Developer Certificate Not Found. Please logout using `appc logout -D` and then re-login again.{color}
2017-11-06T05:28:57.589Z | TRACE  | titanium exited with exit code 100
2017-11-06T05:28:57.590Z | ERROR  | Error: ti run exited with error code 100
    at ChildProcess.<anonymous> (/Users/Ravindra/.appcelerator/install/5.1.0/package/node_modules/appc-cli-titanium/plugins/run.js:92:66)
    at ChildProcess.emit (events.js:110:17)
    at Process.ChildProcess._handle.onexit (child_process.js:1074:12)
2017-11-06T05:28:57.591Z | TRACE  | Sending exit signal to titanium process:  8636
fields.summary: Developer Certificate Not Found. Please logout using `appc logout -D` and then re-login again.
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Command-Line Interface  version = 5.1.0
Operating System              = Mac OS X 10.11.3
Node.js Version                  = 0.12.7
npm Version                       = 2.11.3
Titanium CLI Version          = 5.0.5
Titanium SDK Version        = 5.2.2.GA

comments.body: [~chanakya] Please update your appc CLI version from terminal using {{appc use latest}}, (Studio _should_ have prompted to do this), 5.1.0 is nearly 2 years old now and is no longer supported. Please note that updating will require you to use newer Node versions, we no longer support 0.12.7, and will bring with it a new Alloy version.
Hello [~chanakya], Did you follow on [~eharris], Guide? Let us know the status of your issue.

[~chanakya] ,I just wanted to follow up here. Did you manage to follow the instructions provided earlier? Let us know if you still experience any issue. We would be happy to assist you.
Best Regards!

Hi All,
As per *Ewan Harris* suggestion I updated the Appcelerator CLI and node and npm.
Now am able to login and apps are running successfully.

Updated versions:
Appcelerator Command-Line Interface version = 6.2.3
Node.js Version = 4.6.0
npm Version = 2.15.9

Thanks *Ewan Harris*

I have today the same issue, I have rebooted and `appc use latest`.

At older times I saw my login name during login process. Today the login asks me my `Appcelerator ID`. 

{noformat}
Generating Developer Certificate and Private/Public Keys...
You are now logged in!

rainer@….com logged into organization titanium@….de [100……
{noformat}
